member.name: M:JetBrains.Platform.UI.Tests.TestMnemonicStore.Test(System.String)
member.summary: Runs the test by assigning a mnemonic to the string and checking it against the template.

member.name: M:JetBrains.UI.testSrc.TestOptionsManager.TestPages.Boilerplate.OnOk
member.summary: Invoked when OK button in the options dialog is pressed. If the page returns false, the the options dialog won't be closed, and focus will be put into this page.

member.name: M:JetBrains.UI.testSrc.TestOptionsManager.TestPages.Boilerplate.ValidatePage
member.summary: Check if the settings on the page are consistent, and page could be closed.
member.returns: true if page data is consistent.

member.name: P:JetBrains.UI.testSrc.TestOptionsManager.TestPages.Boilerplate.Control
member.summary: Control to be shown as page. May be Null if the page does not have any UI.

member.name: P:JetBrains.UI.testSrc.TestOptionsManager.TestPages.Boilerplate.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of this option page. or could be used to retrieve the out of it.
